page.title: 09EGMERE MILL'S PRESENT NATURE
page.content: The two mills are now capable of producing up to 120,00 tonnes of animal feed per annum. About 17,000 tonnes can be stored on site. Animal feed making can best be likened to cake making. Ingredients are held in bins and then individually weighed. After being put in the mixer for 4 minutes, it is either sold as meal or made into cubes by adding steam and extruding the mix through a cubing machine.{Typical ingredients}are wheat, barley, oats, peas, soya (in various forms), meat and bone, fish- meal, sunflower, maize - by-products from all over the world. Today in our intensive world we would use growth promoters and drugs. Our{delivery area covers all Norfolk, to Colchester in the South and Skegness in the North. We have 105 staff and are now a fully computerised organisation.
